description:
Grant is a basketball fanatic! There is no doubt that he loves the sport. At first glance, you would think that he would be the star player on a football team but that is not the case at all. Football coaches in school have tried to recruit him, but basketball is where his heart is. He's a full time college student right now and, of course, he is on the basketball team.
It's hard to believe that he says he used to be very skinny. My jaw dropped when he took his shirt off and showed his flawless chest! There was a bit of hair on it and his pubes were showing just at the top of his shorts. I had to see the rest. Sure enough, he's not your typical basketball player — beef from head to toe! Big muscle butt, huge arms, ripped abs, muscled legs and a big thick cock with the right amount of hair everywhere!
Not only was he extremely hot but he was a lot of fun too! He always had a smile on his face and joke to share. But there were just enough moments of shyness as I asked him to get undressed or stroke his cock that made him even hotter...
title: Grant
